General.Name: Envy Technologies Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Envy Technologies Indonesia Tbk provides information system storage and planning services in Indonesia. It also engages in the software program development. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

0.Name: Mr. Mohd Nadzaruddin Bin Abd Hamid
